column1: Draw your favorite memory with me.
Write down your number one goal for the next month.
LOOK INTO EACH OTHER'S EYES FOR 30 SECONDS. WHAT DID YOU NOTICE?
PRESS SHUFFLE ON YOUR MUSIC LIBRARY. EXPLAIN THE FIRST SONG THAT COMES UP!
SHARE SOMETHING YOU'RE MOST GRATEFUL FOR IN THIS CURRENT MOMENT.
SHOW THE FIRST PHOTO IN YOUR CAMERA ROLL. EXPLAIN.
Share your screen time. Both players
